DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to see if neratinib is absorbed, distributed, or eliminated differently when administered in the fasting state versus after a high-fat meal.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Effect Of A High-Fat Meal On The Pharmacokinetics Of Neratinib
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and women of nonchildbearing potential, age 18 to 50 years. Any previous or current clinically significant medical condition or disease.
